--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Dreadplague was still beating her massive wings in front of the 
> Black Fortress. Once again, she roared.
> 
> Dreadplague: Hydras! Hear me, for I deliver a message from Tyrael, 
> my commander.
